# Usage

```
ffprobe -i ~/yourflv.flv -show_frames -print_format json  | ./ffbeauty
```

```
ffprobe -i ~/yourflv.flv -show_frames -print_format json  2>&1 > a
./ffbeauty -f ./a
```

for stream:

```
ffprobe  -i  http://$SERVICE_IP/live/1.flv  -show_frames -print_format json -read_intervals "%+#10"  | ffbeauty
```
